name: Farming Termina-Boar
description:
Play as a survitamin Boar! A game about smashing through fields of genetically engineered corn. Deal with hostile autos: combine harvesters, hunters and obstacles viciously scattered on your way. Controls:
  • use your keyboard (tutorial ingame)
Credits:
  • Brahman a.k.a. Ourson Hirsute: Music & Sound Designer
  • @LeoRototo: Game Designer, Art Director, Developper
  • @LukuluK: Developper, Game Designer
  • @MatoLabu: Level & Game Designer, Integrator, AI Artist
Boar to be alive, GRUIK!!!
